overview: A documentary film about the life and work of 66-year-old Piotr Sudo≈Ç, a collector of dry bread. The director, talking about the film, described the title character as follows: "Mr. Chlebek was a person so extraordinary that everything he did had a deeper meaning for him. What mattered to him was not money, but an idea. He wanted to make people realize that they should respect bread and food".  Three months after shooting, the protagonist was hit by a car while working.
title: Pan Chlebek
